languages.text: "Как интересно — уже второй отряд, который ты ведешь, попадает в засаду мятежников. Есть что сказать в свое оправдание, рядовой?"
"How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"
languages.original_text: "Как интересно — уже второй отряд, который ты ведешь, попадает в засаду мятежников. Есть что сказать в свое оправдание, рядовой?"

traits.locale_text: "How curious. That is the second squad you have led into a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"
"How curious. That is the second squad you have led into a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"
"How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"
"How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"
"How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"
"How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"

languages.text: "Sonderbar. Das ist schon der zweite Trupp unter Eurer Führung, der in einen Hinterhalt der Rebellen gerät. Habt Ihr etwas zu Eurer Verteidigung zu sagen, Soldat?"
languages.original_text: "How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"

traits.locale_text: "Sonderbar. Das ist schon der zweite Trupp unter Eurer Führung, der in einen Hinterhalt der Rebellen gerät. Habt Ihr etwas zu Eurer Verteidigung zu sagen, Soldat?"

languages.text: « C'est étrange. C'est la deuxième escouade sous votre commandement qui tombe dans une embuscade rebelle. Qu'avez-vous à dire pour votre défense, soldat ? »
languages.original_text: "How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est étrange. C'est la deuxième escouade sous votre commandement qui tombe dans une embuscade rebelle. Qu'avez-vous à dire pour votre défense, soldat ? »

languages.text: “真巧啊，这已经是第二次遭到叛军伏击了，领队的人刚好又是你。你还有什么要辩解的吗，士兵？”
languages.original_text: "How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"

traits.locale_text: “真巧啊，这已经是第二次遭到叛军伏击了，领队的人刚好又是你。你还有什么要辩解的吗，士兵？”

languages.text: 「不思議だな。それがお前の指揮する二番目の部隊で、反乱者の待ち伏せに巻き込まれた。何か弁明することはあるか、二等兵よ？」
languages.original_text: "How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"

traits.locale_text: 「不思議だな。それがお前の指揮する二番目の部隊で、反乱者の待ち伏せに巻き込まれた。何か弁明することはあるか、二等兵よ？」

languages.text: «Qué curioso. Es el segundo escuadrón bajo su mando que acaba en una emboscada rebelde. ¿Tiene algo que decir en su defensa, soldado?».
languages.original_text: "How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"

traits.locale_text: «Qué curioso. Es el segundo escuadrón bajo su mando que acaba en una emboscada rebelde. ¿Tiene algo que decir en su defensa, soldado?».

languages.text: "Ne tuhaf. İsyancı pususuna düşen, rehberliğin altındaki ikinci manga bu. Kendini nasıl savunacaksın asker?"
languages.original_text: "How curious. That is the second squad under your lead that ended up in a rebel ambush. Do you have anything to say in your defence, private?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne tuhaf. İsyancı pususuna düşen, rehberliğin altındaki ikinci manga bu. Kendini nasıl savunacaksın asker?"
